personalTraining.title: Personal Training
personalTraining.description: Our training sessions are performed in small groups and are always led by our coaches

bookYourTraining.title: Book your Training
bookYourTraining.description: You don't have to call or stop by the box to book your workouts. From anywhere and at any time you can check availability and sign up through our mobile app

keepInTouch.title: Keep in Touch
keepInTouch.description: Evaluate our workouts to adjust them to your needs so that we can achieve your goals (improve progressively) as well as ours (keep our clients happy)

services.pieceOfFruit: Piece of fruit at ending of training

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Great for those who take wellness seriously

subscribeSection.description: Want to know about news and get started with a FREE workout?
subscribeSection.unsubscribe: Remember, feel free to unsubscribe at any time

staffCard.staffTwoDescription: I'm a 24-year-old semi-professional sports person who enjoys tennis, theatre and competitive dog grooming
